name: IDEA Furniture Building Simulator
description:
This game (prototype) was made for the XAMK International Game Jam between XAMK and Univali.

The Hotfix version allows the player to complete the game. The other version is bugged in a way, that it doesn't allow the player to complete the game.

Game made by "Watch for Rocks":

Aleksi A. aka Rölli - Programmer & Audio

TT - Programmer

Jani F. aka Lyrenlute - Designer & Audio

Hilkka H. aka Dishwa$her - Designer

Sound Credits:

Game background Music loop short by yummie (CC4.0 Manuel Graf - https://manuelgraf.com)

Swing Woosh by Jofae
